doc.title: shirye-shirye
doc.description: Wannan bangare shine game da yadda ake shirye-shirye

example1.title: {{0}}Misali lambar shafi na gida
example1.annotation1: Ƙayyade ko sunan yanki ɗaya ne na farko Idan ba haka ba, dawo {{0}} kuma a daina aiwatar da shi.
example1.annotation2: Ƙayyade ko {0}} ko shafin farko na tashar yana farawa da alamar @ Idan haka ne, koma {{1}}.
example1.annotation3: Ƙayyade ko shafin bidiyo ne. Hanyarsa tana farawa da /kallo, {{0}} za a dawo.
example1.annotation4: Ƙayyade ko gajeriyar shafin bidiyo ne.
example1.annotation5: A wasu lokuta, ana mayar da {{0}}.
